The graphic was published by an Australi: based Instagram user on September 16, 2020, and has received more than 500 likes.
The image is titled: CORONAVIRUS FAQ" and bears the logo of the UK's National Health Service (NHS).
The text in the image includes statement: 19, the accuracy of PCR tests, the lack of scientific evidence behind social distancing and masks, and the safety of vaccines.
The NHS denied producing the graphic in: 2020, and official NHS advice contradicts the claims made in the graphic.
